summary: An Ordinance appropriating money from the General Fund, to pay the City's portion of the cost of cross-walks for the improvement of Twenty-sixth Avenue, from the South line of Tract "J", of the S. B. Yesler's Donation Claim Tracts, to the South line of J. H. Rengstorff's Addition, and other connecting streets and avenues, by grading the same and by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, as provided for in Ordinance No. 14075, creating Local Improvement District No. 1291.
